preqs: Admission to BVA, BA/BVA, BBusCom/BVA, BVA/BEdu,DOFS
description: This unit is an introduction to visual arts studio practice. Students will familiarise themselves with different processes, methods and materials through experiencing different fine art disciplines. Projects will be set which introduce conceptual, formal and technical methods by which particular ideas may be fully explored and investigated. Occupational, Health, Safety and Environment issues generic to art and design and specific to each discipline will be addressed.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
